p: So far, no published studies have observed the effects of honey on SARS-CoV-2. To the best of our knowledge, there are four registered clinical trials that are currently recruiting and even a completed study that assesses the efficacy of consuming honey and its active compounds in patients with COVID-19 (NCT04323345, NCT04345549, NCT04347382, NCT04468139). One of the trials aims to explore the efficacy of using 1 mg/kg of natural honey for 14 consecutive days compared with the standard health care protocols [ 104].
